definitions.definition: the process of helping somebody to return to a normal, healthy life after they have been in prison or very ill
the act of starting to consider that somebody is good or acceptable after a long period during which they were considered bad or unacceptable

examples.text: the rehabilitation of Magritte as an artist

definitions.definition: the process of returning a building, place or area of activity to its previous good condition

examples.text: the rehabilitation of the steel industry
